ygData.subject: Re: Monks
ygData.msgSnippet: They can deal massive amounts of damage and have a built in Haste ability that kicks in at high levels. They have the Block skill. (one more dodge like
ygData.messageBody:
They can deal massive amounts of damage and have
a built in Haste ability that kicks in at high
levels. They have the Block skill. (one more "dodge like"
skill) They can Feign Death.<br><br>Those are just a few
of the points. But I'd wait for the expansion so you
don't have to be Human. Humans have no night vision and
have "well rounded" stats, which in EQ is a BAD thing.
EQ is geared towards polarization. You got a melee
class - pump the melee stats, caster - pump the mana
stat.<br><br>Just some opinions.<br><br>Nelmunbar<br>Enchanter on
Brell
